    • 构造器详细资料

      • ChatRoomClient

        public ChatRoomClient(java.lang.String appKey,
              java.lang.String masterSecret)

      • ChatRoomClient

        public ChatRoomClient(java.lang.String appKey,
              java.lang.String masterSecret,
              HttpProxy proxy)

      • ChatRoomClient

        public ChatRoomClient(java.lang.String appKey,
              java.lang.String masterSecret,
              HttpProxy proxy,
              JMessageConfig config)
        Create a JMessage Base Client
        参数:
        appKey - The KEY of one application on JPush.
        masterSecret - API access secret of the appKey.
        proxy - The proxy, if there is no proxy, should be null.
        config - The client configuration. Can use JMessageConfig.getInstance() as default.

    • 方法详细资料

      • createChatRoom

        public CreateChatRoomResult createChatRoom(ChatRoomPayload payload)
                                    throws APIConnectionException,
                                           APIRequestException
        Create chat room
        参数:
        payload - ChatRoomPayload
        返回:
        result contains room id
        抛出:
        APIConnectionException - connect exception
        APIRequestException - request exception

      • getBatchChatRoomInfo

                                        throws APIConnectionException,

        参数:

        返回:
        ChatRoomListResult

      • updateChatRoomInfo

        public ResponseWrapper updateChatRoomInfo(long roomId,
                                 java.lang.String ownerUsername,
                                 java.lang.String name,
                                 java.lang.String desc)
                                   throws APIConnectionException,
                                          APIRequestException
        Update chat room info
        参数:
        roomId - room id
        ownerUsername - owner username
        name - new chat room name
        desc - chat room description
        返回:
        No content
        抛出:
        APIConnectionException - connect exception
        APIRequestException - request exception

      • updateUserSpeakStatus

        public ResponseWrapper updateUserSpeakStatus(long roomId,
                                    java.lang.String username,
                                    int flag)
                                      throws APIConnectionException,
                                             APIRequestException
        Update user speak status
        参数:
        roomId - chat room id
        username - user to be modified
        flag - 0 means allow to speak, 1 means forbid to speak in chat room
        返回:
        No content
        抛出:
        APIConnectionException - connect exception
        APIRequestException - request exception
